channel.title: A few things I need help with
channel.description:
Hey guys, Thank you for reading this.
Well I'm new to Making private servers. So far I have done everything, Portforwarding, No-IP downloaded source and client etc. But now I'm stuck .
First of all I get a
[code]javac: file not found *.Java usage: javac <options> <source files> [/code]
Whenever I try to use my Compile or Compiler , Even though my path for it is set up correctly.
[code]@echo off title Compile "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
And also, Whenever I try to run my Client I get a [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2z857c0.png[/img]
I'm using Pk Planet client and source, And I'm running Windows 7 .
Thanks alot ! :)

item.title: A few things I need help with
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Mr. Despair:

These errors are self explanatory. The first error, the things you’re trying to compile do not have .java associated. Your second error, it can’t find the client.class, another words, you don’t have it.

You’re a moron.

@killercam, this is an old topic but since you need help. The problem is that you have not set your environmental variables correct. I’d rather not get into a discussion on how to set them. Use the search button and you should easily find your answer. Good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: A few things I need help with

item.title: A few things I need help with
item.dc:creator: @killercam killercam
item.description:
@killercam wrote:

I have the same problem. Ive been looking for an answer all morning and can’t find one either

Read full topic
